Text: Tony Ruppes Restaurant Montrose Boulevard When was the last time you had Seared American Foie Gras with Pear Chutney Pomegranate Molasses and Braised Frisee and paired it with a glass of Royal Tokji Well thats just too long Call us at or email us at and let us make reservations for you today Hope to see you soon we miss you
